Footer.Slogan: Modern technologies, personalized approach, and years of experience — all for your dental comfort.

mainSection.Description: Afraid of dentists? Forget about that with Status Dental Clinic! We are a dental clinic where fear has no place — only comfort, care, and confidence in the result. We've created a space filled with calm, where treatment becomes a pleasant experience. It's a place where your fears are understood and your wishes are respected.

ServiceSection.DiagnosticDescription: Accurate diagnostics is the first step to a healthy smile. We use modern equipment to detect problems at an early stage.
ServiceSection.PreventiveDescription: This is the foundation of dental health. Regular cleanings and check-ups help prevent serious dental diseases.
ServiceSection.OrthopedicsDescription: We restore functionality and aesthetics to your smile with high-quality crowns, and veneers help create the perfect Hollywood smile.
ServiceSection.OrthodonticsDescription: Straight teeth mean not only beauty, but also health. We will find the best bite correction solution for both children and adults.
ServiceSection.SurgeryDescription: Painless, safe, professional. Tooth extraction, resection, and other surgical procedures are in reliable hands.
ServiceSection.ImplantationDescription: We restore teeth permanently. Implants are a reliable alternative to natural teeth with a natural look and function.

TeamSection.Description: Dentists who give you perfect healthy smiles every day.

CasesSection.MoreLong: See more examples of our work
CasesSection.Description: Each smile is the result of meticulous work, a personalized approach, and genuine care for the patient. We don’t just treat teeth — we restore confidence, comfort in communication, and the joy of seeing your reflection in the mirror. A beautiful smile begins right here, in our hands.

AboutSection.Description: We are a team of professionals who truly love what we do. Our clinic combines the latest technologies, modern equipment, and a compassionate approach to every patient. We continually improve our skills, pursue ongoing education, and implement global treatment standards.

Card.description1: Came in with acute pain — was seen the same day. Impressed by the doctor’s speed and professionalism. Modern equipment and friendly staff.
Card.description2: Very satisfied with the service quality! The treatment was completely painless. I’ll definitely come back and recommend it to everyone!
Card.description3: Had my teeth cleaned and whitened. The results exceeded my expectations! The doctor was very attentive. I really appreciate how the clinic cares about patient comfort.

Address.Title: Address
Address.Address: Kyiv, Sofii Rusovoi St. 3, dental clinic “STATUS”

AboutPage.Description1: Our clinic combines innovative equipment, a cozy atmosphere, and caring staff. We have created a space where every patient feels comfortable and confident.
AboutPage.Description2: We use advanced technologies for accurate diagnostics and painless treatment. Modern equipment ensures effective procedures, maximum patient comfort, and high quality.
AboutPage.Description3: Our specialists are always attentive to your needs. We create a warm atmosphere so that every visitor feels care, support, and a sincere smile from the very first moment.

Services.Description1: Modern dentistry starts with accurate and timely diagnostics. It allows not only to detect existing problems with teeth or gums but also to prevent complications in the future. In our clinic, we pay special attention to the diagnostic stage, as the accuracy of diagnostics determines the effectiveness of subsequent treatment. Diagnostics in our clinic include both visual examination and the use of modern digital equipment: intraoral cameras, dental X-rays, orthopantomograms (panoramic images), and 3D tomography. These methods provide a complete picture of the oral cavity condition: teeth, bone tissue, gums, joints, and other structures. Even the smallest lesions — cracks, hidden carious cavities, early stages of periodontitis — are carefully detected. The diagnostic procedure takes minimal time and causes no discomfort to the patient. Our doctors work carefully, explaining each stage of the examination and the results. We strive for the patient to not only receive information but also understand its significance.

Advantages1.Av1: Accurate and fast diagnostics with modern equipment

Services.Description2: Prevention is the foundation of a healthy smile and self-confidence. In our clinic, we emphasize the importance of regular oral care not only at home but also with a dentist. Preventive check-ups allow timely detection of potential problems — from dental plaque to early signs of caries or gum inflammation. We use modern methods of professional cleaning, tartar removal, polishing, and enamel remineralization. All procedures are performed gently and painlessly, considering each patient's individual needs. Prevention also includes consultations on proper tooth brushing, selection of hygiene products, and nutrition. Regular preventive visits not only save time and money in the future but also ensure long-term dental health. Our specialists will help you maintain the natural beauty of your smile for many years.

Advantages2.Av1: Timely detection of problems at early stages
Advantages2.Av3: Professional teeth cleaning and tartar removal

Services.Description3: Prosthodontics in dentistry is a set of measures aimed at restoring the function and aesthetics of the dental arch. In our clinic, we offer modern solutions for patients with tooth loss or damage that affect comfort and appearance. Using an individual approach, we select dentures, crowns, bridges, or implants that best meet the patient's needs. Our specialists work with modern materials that ensure durability, aesthetics, and a natural look. Procedures are comfortable and minimally invasive because we care about each patient's safety and peace of mind. Proper prosthodontic care allows you to regain a beautiful smile and maintain the health of teeth and gums for many years.

Advantages3.Av1: High-quality restoration of tooth function and chewing
Advantages3.Av2: Individual selection of dentures and crowns

Services.Description4: Orthodontics is a specialized field of dentistry focused on correcting bite and straightening teeth. In our clinic, we use modern correction methods including braces systems, clear aligners, and other innovative technologies. A correct bite not only improves the aesthetics of your smile but also prevents many problems with teeth, gums, and jaws. Treatment is individualized and carefully planned, considering the patient’s age and specifics. Our orthodontists provide comfortable conditions, regularly monitor progress, and help achieve long-term results. The use of modern equipment and materials ensures safety, effectiveness, and aesthetics at all stages of treatment.
Services.Description5: Surgical treatment in dentistry is a complex of high-precision procedures aimed at resolving complicated issues with teeth, gums, and bone tissue. In our clinic, surgeries are performed using modern equipment and the latest techniques, ensuring minimal discomfort and quick recovery. We offer tooth extractions of any complexity, implantation, bone grafting, and periodontal disease treatment. All interventions are conducted by experienced specialists adhering to the highest standards of sterility and safety. Patients receive detailed consultations, support throughout treatment, and individual care. Our goal is to restore health and comfort in the shortest possible time.
Services.Description6: Dental implantation is a modern method for restoring lost teeth, allowing you to regain the natural appearance and functionality of your oral cavity. In our clinic, we use high-quality implants from leading manufacturers that guarantee durability and safety. The implantation procedure involves placing titanium posts into the jawbone, which serve as a reliable foundation for crowns or dentures. Our specialists carefully plan every treatment stage, using 3D diagnostics for precise implant positioning. This ensures patient comfort, minimal trauma, and fast recovery. Implantation restores not only the aesthetics of your smile but also chewing function, improving your quality of life.
Services.Description7: Gnathology is a branch of dentistry focused on the study and treatment of disorders of the masticatory system function, including joints, muscles, and bite. In our clinic, the gnathological approach helps patients relieve jaw pain, headaches, teeth grinding (bruxism), and other symptoms affecting quality of life. Doctors use modern diagnostic methods including bite analysis, electromyography, and 3D visualization. Individual treatment plans include bite correction, manufacture of special splints to relax muscles, and rehabilitation of masticatory functions. This comprehensive approach helps preserve the health of teeth and joints and prevents complications.

Advantages7.Av1: Comprehensive diagnostics of the masticatory system
Advantages7.Av2: Treatment of bruxism and teeth grinding
Advantages7.Av4: Pain relief and bite function restoration

Services.Description8: Tooth restoration is a modern method of restoring the shape, color, and functionality of damaged teeth. In our clinic, we use advanced materials that closely resemble natural enamel in aesthetics and strength. Restoration quickly and painlessly eliminates the effects of caries, cracks, chips, or discoloration. Doctors apply direct and indirect restoration techniques, individually selecting the method for each patient. This allows teeth to regain a natural look and durability, giving the patient confidence in their smile. The procedure is painless, with minimal intervention in the tooth structure.

Advantages8.Av1: Restoration of the natural shape of teeth
Advantages8.Av4: Long-lasting strength and aesthetics of the restoration

Services.Description9: Professional oral hygiene is a set of measures aimed at maintaining the health of teeth and gums. It includes the removal of dental plaque, tartar, and contaminants that cannot be eliminated by regular home cleaning. At our clinic, the procedure is performed using modern equipment and safe techniques, ensuring maximum comfort for the patient. Regular hygiene helps prevent the development of caries, periodontitis, and other diseases, improves breath freshness, and the overall condition of the oral cavity. Our specialists select an individual care program and provide recommendations for home care.

DoctorsPage.Description: Dentists who give you perfect, healthy smiles every day.

Doctor1.Name: Oleksandr Oleksandrovych
Doctor1.Description: An experienced general dentist with a personalized approach to each patient. He has over 15 years of practice in therapeutic and aesthetic dentistry. Works with both adults and children, focusing not only on the quality of treatment but also on patient comfort. Continuously improves his skills through courses and internships both in Ukraine and abroad.
Doctor1.qualities1: Extremely gentle approach — the doctor knows how to work with patients who are afraid of dental visits. Even the youngest patients feel calm and safe.
Doctor1.qualities2: Modern treatment methods — uses the latest technologies and materials to ensure effective and painless treatment.

Doctor2.Name: Ivan Mykolayovych
Doctor2.Description: Specializes in therapeutic dental treatment — particularly caries, pulpitis, periodontitis, and the prevention of oral diseases. He has over 12 years of hands-on experience and continuously enhances his knowledge through specialized courses and conferences. His main principle is pain-free, stress-free treatment. He is great at explaining complex issues in simple terms and always aims to preserve the patient’s natural teeth for as long as possible.
Doctor2.qualities1: Comprehensive approach to treatment — Ivan Mykolayovych always considers the overall condition of the oral cavity, not just individual symptoms.
Doctor2.qualities2: Clear communication and guidance — explains each step of the treatment process so the patient feels confident and calm.

Doctor3.Name: Volodymyr Volodymyrovych
Doctor3.Description: A specialist in prosthodontic dentistry with over 10 years of experience. His main focus is restoring dental function and aesthetics using crowns, bridges, inlays, and modern prostheses. He pays great attention to precision, which ensures patient comfort. Volodymyr Volodymyrovych combines classical prosthodontic knowledge with modern digital technologies, allowing for a natural appearance and perfect fit of dental constructions.
Doctor3.qualities1: Maximum precision in work — thanks to digital scanning and a personalized approach, prosthetic constructions are long-lasting and comfortable.
Doctor3.qualities2: Natural smile aesthetics — helps restore not only dental functionality but also patient confidence in their smile.
